content: That's a lot of great information! I'll definitely try out some of those techniques. I've been using Tamiya acrylics for my first few projects, but I just started working on a 1/25 scale Ford Mustang Shelby GT350R and I'm trying out Vallejo paints, which seem to have a better color range. Do you have any experience with Vallejo or have any tips on using their paints?
